sqlMap.statement: SELECT C.* FROM Contact C WHERE C.idContact = #idContact# LIMIT 0,1
SELECT C.* FROM Contact C WHERE C.idContact = #idContact# LIMIT 0,1
SELECT C.idContact, C.idCivilite, C.nom, C.prenom, C.mail, C.tel, C.fonction, C.idService, C.idCentreGestion FROM Contact C WHERE C.idContact = #idContact# LIMIT 0,1
SELECT C.* FROM Contact C INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion WHERE C.idService = #idService# AND CG.codeUniversite = #codeUniversite#
SELECT C.* FROM Contact C INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion WHERE C.idService = #idService# AND CG.idCentreGestion = #idCentreGestion#

SELECT C.* FROM Contact C INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion INNER JOIN NiveauCentre N ON N.idNiveauCentre = CG.idNiveauCentre WHERE C.login = #login# AND N.libelleNiveauCentre = 'ENTREPRISE' LIMIT 0,1

SELECT C.idContact, C.idService, C.idCivilite, C.idCentreGestion, C.nom, C.prenom, C.mail, C.tel, C.fax,C.login, C.mdp, C.fonction, C.dateCreation, C.loginCreation, C.infosAJour, C.loginInfosAJour, C.loginModif,C.dateModif, C.commentaire,C.derniereConnexion, C.avantDerniereConnexion FROM Contact C INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion INNER JOIN NiveauCentre as N ON CG.idNiveauCentre = N.idNiveauCentre INNER JOIN Service Se ON C.idService = Se.idService INNER JOIN Structure S ON S.idStructure = Se.idStructure WHERE C.mail = #mail# AND N.libelleNiveauCentre = 'ENTREPRISE' AND S.idStructure = #idStructure# AND C.login IS NOT NULL AND C.mdp IS NOT NULL LIMIT 0, 1

SELECT C.* FROM Contact C INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion INNER JOIN NiveauCentre as N ON CG.idNiveauCentre = N.idNiveauCentre INNER JOIN Service Se ON C.idService = Se.idService INNER JOIN Structure S ON S.idStructure = Se.idStructure WHERE C.mail = #mail# AND N.libelleNiveauCentre = 'ENTREPRISE' AND S.idStructure = #idStructure# LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Offre O WHERE O.idContactCand = #idContact# OR O.idContactInfo = #idContact#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Convention Co WHERE Co.idContact = #idContact# OR Co.idSignataire = #idContact#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Contact WHERE idCentreGestion = #idCentreGestion#

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Contact SET nom = #nom#, prenom = #prenom#, mail = #mail#, tel= #tel#, fax = #fax#, fonction = #fonction#, idCentreGestion = #idCentreGestion#, loginModif = #loginModif#, dateModif = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), infosAJour = CURDATE(), loginInfosAJour = #loginInfosAJour#, idService = #idService#, idCivilite = #idCivilite# WHERE idContact = #id#
UPDATE Contact SET login = #login#, mdp = #mdp#, loginModif = #loginModif#, dateModif = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), infosAJour = CURDATE(), loginInfosAJour = #loginInfosAJour# WHERE idContact = #id#
UPDATE Contact SET infosAJour = CURDATE(), loginInfosAJour = #loginInfosAJour# WHERE idContact = #id#
UPDATE Contact SET login = NULL, mdp = NULL WHERE idService = #idService#
